config_incomplete_error: Configuration incomplete. Please fill in all fields.
configuration_wizard_tooltip: Reset configuration completely and restart the configuration wizard
client_id_placeholder: Client ID for your application in Powens
client_secret_placeholder: Client Secret for your application in Powens
users_token_placeholder: Users Token (available in Settings > Server keys)
configure_domain_client_first: Please configure domain and client ID first
user_management_info: This list displays all users in your Powens application. Configure unknown users by adding their authentication token.
configure_api_credentials: Please configure your API credentials in the main configuration page to use all features.
no_users_found: No users found in your Powens application.
enter_users_token: Enter your Users Token above to display users.
revoke_tokens_explanation: If checked, all other permanent tokens for this user will be deleted.
fill_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields
users_found: {{count}} user(s) found in your Powens application
no_users_found_create_new: No existing users found. You can create a new one.
initial_setup_description: Configure your Powens application by providing your API credentials
where_to_find_info: ℹ️ Where to find this information?
info_location_description: This information is available in your Powens dashboard, "Settings" > "Server keys" section
users_found_description: Here are the users found in your Powens application
no_existing_users_found: No existing users found in your Powens application.
have_existing_token: I have an existing authentication token
token_generate_help: Click the 🔄 button to automatically generate an authentication token
token_regenerate_help: Click the 🔄 button to regenerate a new authentication token
confirm_clear_all_data: Are you sure you want to clear all configuration and user data? This action cannot be undone.
configuration_cleared: All configuration and user data has been cleared.
info_location_description: You can find these values in your organization's settings.
app_info_location_description: You will find these values in the Applications section after adding a new application. You can use {{redirectUri}} as a redirect URI.
